projects.title: GeoSpatial Analysis and House Price Prediction model
projects.summary: I am using the USA census data and analyze the house price movements and find the top 10 investable zip codes in USA.

projects.title: Predicting Probability of Default
projects.summary: Build a machine learning model to predict the probability of deafult in the next month for lending club's loan portfolio.

projects.title: Trading_Strategy_Using_Satellite_Imagery_Data
projects.summary: Is it possible to use Satellite Imagery data to predict the stock price movement of a casino industry stock ?

projects.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction
projects.summary: Multivariate Multi Step Time Series modelling using GRU layer and recurrent dropout

projects.title: Asset Allocation using Convex Portfolio Optimization
projects.summary: In this project we study and compare the asset allocation methodology followed through mean variance portfolio optimization (MVO) and Sharpe Ratio optimization by using the PyPortfolioOpt library in python

projects.title: SPX_Futures_Roll_Strategy
projects.summary: The Project aims to design the optimal monthly roll strategy for SPX futures such that we have minimum roll cost. I predict the roll cost that can occur over a 1yr rolling basis to find if the futures are costlier than holding a stock.
